logic

Class Game

  • Object
    • logic.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    This is the class that will manage all parts of the game, bringing them together. Its execution sets up the application window, begins other threads for animation, and loops through the story of the game until the user either wins or loses.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        This is where the game begins.

      • gameLoop

        static void gameLoop()
        The basic program flow-of-control for our game. You could design your own flow-of-control if you want to make a completely different game. The basic flow here is for every iteration to interact with the user, and then process their choices until the user either achieves their goal, or fails.
